SELECT max(order_id) order_id FROM `order`
insert into order_fault (fault_id,order_id) values(#{faultId},#{orderId})
mapper.select: select of.*,o.*,f.*,m.*,ft.*, f.fault_name faultName,m.model_name modelName,ft.type_name typeName from order_fault of RIGHT join `order` o on of.order_id=o.order_id left join fault f on of.fault_id=f.fault_id left join fault_type ft on f.type_id=ft.type_id left join model m on f.model_id=m.model_id where of.order_id=#{orderId}
